summary: Drivers: hv: vmbus: Increase wait time for VMbus unload
details:
Drivers: hv: vmbus: Increase wait time for VMbus unload

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.269 by commit 9e5f64bb615b435a9af501dc4167258acc1ba44e, it was introduced in version v4.9.237 by commit 2b557a0612ae0aec89c6649c19467830f6965e76. For more details please see the references link.
